00127     ColumnFamily *
00128     get_column_family(const String &name, bool get_deleted=false) {
00129       ColumnFamilyMap::iterator iter = m_column_family_map.find(name);
00130 
00131       if (iter != m_column_family_map.end()) {
00132         if (get_deleted || iter->second->deleted == false)
00133           return (iter->second);
00134       }
00135       return (ColumnFamily*) 0;
00136     }
00137 
00138     ColumnFamily *
00139     get_column_family(uint32_t id, bool get_deleted=false) {
00140       ColumnFamilyIdMap::iterator iter = m_column_family_id_map.find(id);
00141       if (iter != m_column_family_id_map.end()) {
00142         if (get_deleted || iter->second->deleted==false)
00143           return (iter->second);
00144       }
00145       return (ColumnFamily*) 0;
00146     }
